description:
What you can expect in this course:

  • over 30 lectures and 8 hours of content
  • interviews with industry experts
  • health & safety aspects at events and festivals
  • learn how to create a risk assessment
  • exercises throughout

This course is for you if you are an (aspiring) event planner, an event manager, or an event organizer.

At the end of this course you will have a better understanding of health and safety aspects at events and festivals. I will teach you how to create a risk assessment, how to conduct a site survey, and how to increase the well-being of your audience.

Throughout the course you will find exercises and I encourage you to use the discussion board to interact with fellow students.

Besides lectures, exercises, and reading material I have also included an interview with Joseph Pred, expert in risk and safety emergency management. Joseph has worked for festivals such as Burning Man, Glastonbury, and Insomniac.

There are 33 bite sized lectures in this course. I have included documents such as the Event Safety Guide, the Safety to Sports Grounds guide, and Fire Safety documents.
title: Event Safety
